ConsoleParser - Class in com.ptl.Communication.Console
Is a one of modules used to parse command line input Main purpose is to read input stream from console, parse it and write commands to proper file in Messages module
ConsoleParser() - Constructor for class com.ptl.Communication.Console.ConsoleParser
 
CONSTANT_WHITE - com.ptl.Light.Programs.AvailablePrograms
 
Controller - Class in com.ptl.Light
Class is main module of light control system For each second class check if some triggers was fired if new order come and it is triggered run new program this case is special and needed because if trigger for previous order was fired and trigger for new order will be fired too, so system treat it as there was no change at all Surely it's mistake, so that's the point for special if clause Case in which for previous order trigger was fired and now is not is covered in 4th if clause if previously trigger was not fired but now is it's high time to execute program if previously trigger was fired and now is also fired just idle if previously trigger was fired but now it is not it's time to switch off lights
Controller() - Constructor for class com.ptl.Light.Controller
